content: Let's say I needed to use AWS (or GCP) in my Roc program. Would there be a corresponding library written in pure Roc? Or, would someone need to create a platform used by Roc? Like using the AWS crate in Rust to create a platform for Roc, or Go + GCP libraries for a similar GCP platform used by Roc?
Someone will write a package in pure roc I imagine. And then any platform that has say support for TCP primitives will be able to use it.
